mapper.update: UPDATE CALENDAR SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE CAL_NO = #{calNo}
mapper.select: SELECT C.CAL_NO ,C.CATE_NO ,C.TITLE ,C.CONTENT ,C.ENROLL_DATE ,C.MODIFY_DATE ,C.START_DATE ,C.END_DATE ,C.STATUS ,E.NICK AS WRITER ,C.STAR FROM CALENDAR C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.WRITER = E.EMP_NO WHERE C.STATUS = 'Y' AND C.WRITER = #{writer} ORDER BY C.START_DATE ASC
SELECT COUNT(CAL_NO) FROM CALENDAR WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT C.CAL_NO ,C.CATE_NO ,C.TITLE ,C.CONTENT ,C.ENROLL_DATE ,C.MODIFY_DATE ,C.START_DATE ,C.END_DATE ,C.STATUS ,E.NICK AS WRITER FROM CALENDAR C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.WRITER = E.EMP_NO WHERE C.CAL_NO = #{calNo} AND C.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT C.CAL_NO ,C.CATE_NO ,C.TITLE ,C.CONTENT ,C.ENROLL_DATE ,C.MODIFY_DATE ,C.START_DATE ,C.END_DATE ,C.STATUS ,E.NICK AS WRITER FROM CALENDAR C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.WRITER = E.EMP_NO WHERE C.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT C.CAL_NO ,C.CATE_NO ,C.TITLE ,C.CONTENT ,C.ENROLL_DATE ,C.MODIFY_DATE ,C.START_DATE ,C.END_DATE ,C.STAR ,C.STATUS ,E.NICK AS WRITER FROM CALENDAR C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.WRITER = E.EMP_NO WHERE C.STATUS = 'Y' AND C.STAR = 'Y' AND C.WRITER = #{writer} ORDER BY C.START_DATE ASC
